review1.comment: Quite busy this morning near Palms, would recommend staying away till 12pm to avoid any crowds.

review2.comment: Nice an quite today, hardly anyone here. Great to social distance

beach1.name: Seven Mile Beach
beach1.description: Situated on Grand Cayman’s west shore, Seven Mile Beach actually now measures only 5.5 miles. But its gorgeous clear waters and coral sands still lure visitors from around the world.
beach1.creator: 5e54791497742c3e5c20eb59

beach2.name: Rum Point
beach2.description: Located on the tranquil North Side of Grand Cayman, Rum Point is the perfect place to chill out. Soft white sand, combined with crystal clear shallow water makes it the perfect destination for families, while couples can grab a shady hammock and relax.
beach2.creator: 5e54791497742c3e5c20eb59

beach3.name: Public Beach
beach3.description: Public Beach is the largest and most popular beach on Seven Mile Beach with restroom facilities, beach cabanas and watersport options on-site. Located directly next to Calico Jack's beach bar.
